Posts.Content: Feb 21, 2017 03:06PM Maw123 wrote: I had a core needle biopsy yesterday and it wasn't the worst test I ever had. Completely painless. It took me three weeks to go from the sonogram to the biopsy so that felt like forever. It takes a lot of effort to keep my mind occupied but so far I've done ok. Tonight I feel sick though. Sending everybody positive energy and good thoughts for calm and sleep as we forge ahead.
Posts.Title: Suspicious mammogram, waiting for biopsy, very scared TartletMom cattledoglv
